meanings.sent1: The pronephric structure in the embryo is crucial for early development.

meanings.sent3: The pronephric cells decided to throw a party in the kidney.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the anterior part of the embryonic kidney.
meanings.sent1: During the examination, the doctor focused on the pronephric region of the kidney.
meanings.sent2: The pronephric segment of the kidney plays a vital role in early development.
meanings.sent3: The pronephric area of the kidney seemed to have its own personality.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to the project was as strong as the pronephric section of the kidney.
meanings.sent5: The colors in the painting blended together like the pronephric part of the kidney.
